title: Validator monitor errors pre-genesis

labels.name: meta-bug
labels.description: Issues that identify a bug and require a fix.

body:
### Describe the bug

We are running the validator monitor once at the end of every epoch (`onceEveryEndOfEpoch`)
https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/a11427edba4a0cabcb4b212a9eeef78199bea246/packages/beacon-node/src/metrics/validatorMonitor.ts#L609
https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/a11427edba4a0cabcb4b212a9eeef78199bea246/packages/beacon-node/src/chain/chain.ts#L806-L807

This causes errors pre-genesis and there is no reason to run it in the first place as there is no validator activity to monitor.

```
Sep-26 15:35:54.002[chain]           error: error on validator monitor onceEveryEndOfEpoch slot=-13921 Can only get block root in the past currentSlot=0 slot=0
Error: Can only get block root in the past currentSlot=0 slot=0
    at getBlockRootAtSlot (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/state-transition/src/util/blockRoot.ts:14:11)
    at Object.onceEveryEndOfEpoch (file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/metrics/validatorMonitor.ts:624:43)
    at file:///home/nico/projects/ethereum/lodestar/packages/beacon-node/src/chain/chain.ts:807:29
``` 

### Expected behavior

No validator monitor errors pre-genesis. A simple check if the slot is pre-genesis should be sufficient.

### Steps to reproduce

This can be easily reproduced on holeksy network since it is pre-genesis right now

`./lodestar beacon --network holesky --execution.engineMock --eth1 false --logLevel debug --metrics`

### Additional context

_No response_

### Operating system

Linux

### Lodestar version or commit hash

unstable
